posts.excerpt: 什么是DSL？ DSL(Domain Specific Language) A domain-specific language (DSL) is a computer language specialized to a particular application domain. This is in contrast to a general-purpose language (GPL), which is broadly applicable across domains, and lacks specialized features for a particular domain.简而言之，针对某一特定领域，具有受限表达性的一种计算机程序设计语言
posts.text: 什么是DSL？ DSL(Domain Specific Language) A domain-specific language (DSL) is a computer language specialized to a particular application domain. This is in contrast to a general-purpose language (GPL), which is broadly applicable across domains, and lacks specialized features for a particular domain.简而言之，针对某一特定领域，具有受限表达性的一种计算机程序设计语言 你可能用到的DSL(Ruby 领域) Rails Routing 1234Rails.application.routes.draw do root 'pages#home' resources :pages, only: [:index, :show]end Rspec 123456789describe Array do describe "includes_subset?" do it "finds subsets" do a = [1,2,3,4,5] b = [1,2] expect(a.includes_subset?(b)).to eq(true) end endend Rake Tasks 123456namespace :backup do desc "Backup assets" task :assets => :environment do tar_assets endend DB Migrations 123456789class CreateUploads < ActiveRecord::Migration def change create_table :user do |t| t.string :name t.string :email t.timestamps end endend FactoryGirl 123456FactoryGirl.define do factory :user do name 'xiaofang' email 'xiaofang@test.com' endend 怎么用ruby实现DSL 下面我们来给factory_girl找一个男朋友factory_boy 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768require 'active_support/core_ext/string'class User attr_accessor :name, :emailendmodule FactoryBoy @registry = {} def self.registry @registry end class Builder attr_reader :attributes def initialize @attributes = {} end def method_missing(name, *args, &block) @attributes[name] = args[0] end end class Definition def factory(name, &block) builder = Builder.new if block_given? builder.instance_eval(&block) end FactoryBoy.registry[name] = builder end end def self.define(&block) definition = Definition.new definition.instance_eval(&block) if block_given? end def self.build(name, overrides = {}) raise FactoryNotRegistry, "Factory haven't registry!" unless @registry.has_key?(name) instant = FactoryBoy.const_get(name.to_s.classify).new attrs = @registry[name].attributes.merge(overrides) attrs.each do |name, value| instant.send("#{name.to_s}=", value) end instant end class FactoryNotRegistry < StandardError; endendFactoryBoy.define do factory :user do name 'zhangsan' email 'zhangsan@gmail.com' endendp FactoryBoy.registry #=> {:user=>#<FactoryBoy::Builder:0x00000003237b40 @attributes={:name=>"zhangsan", :email=>"zhangsan@gmail.com"}>}p FactoryBoy.build(:user) #=> #<User:0x00000003237348 @name="zhangsan", @email="zhangsan@gmail.com">p FactoryBoy.build(:user, name: 'lisi', email: 'lisi@gmail.com') # => #<User:0x00000003236e48 @name="lisi", @email="lisi@gmail.com">p FactoryBoy.build(:other) #=> Factory haven't registry! (FactoryBoy::FactoryNotRegistry) 关键在于理解instant_eval 和 block

posts.title: instant_eval和block的区别
posts.text: 1234567891011121314151617181920class Test attr_accessor :var def say_hello(&block) instance_eval(&block) end def say_hello2(&block) block.call endendTest.new.say_hello do p self #=> main @var = 100endTest.new.say_hello2 do p self #=> #<Test:0x00000002b1e200> @var = 100end 结论： block的作用域是main，instant_eval的作用域是instant本身
